attrs.name: delimiter
attrs.desc: Set the separator between IP address segments. The default value is '. '.;Set the class name of the separator between IP segments. The default value is'icon-dot-ipv4'.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is icon-dot-ipv4.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Set the component size. The optional values of this attribute are medium / small / mini

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Set the disabled attribute of the text. The default value is false.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: readonly
attrs.desc: Set the read-only attribute of the text. The default value is false.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Sets the type attribute in the IpAddress box. The default value is IPv4 and the value can be IPv6. ;The value of this attribute can be IPv4 or IPv6
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is IPv4.

attrs.name: value
attrs.desc: Set the default text display value.

events.name: blur
events.desc:
The event is triggered when the text box loses the focus; onBlur(){
// do something you want...}

events.name: focus
events.desc:
This event is triggered when a text box obtains the focus; onFocus(){
// do something you want...}

events.name: change
input
select
